name: webe_functional_programming
description: Development and Practice for leveraging Functional Programming Paradigm techniques as well as tilizing the NPM Scripting power for development task, testing, uglification and minification, bundling, and dependancy managment for a Node.js Server-Side Application that utilizes templating for HTML generation coupled with noSQL database modeling through MongoDB integration and mongoose's flexible versatility. Node.js with Express harnessing the templating uniqueness of express-handlebars.
author: Gordon R Mullen Jr
